events.name: officially launching the Code Club
events.description: This is 2022 we started the new phase, officially launching the Code Club at A G Patil Institute of Technology ! 🎉 Our mission is to create a thriving community of passionate coders, innovators, and problem-solvers who will shape the future of technology. 💻✨ With the support of our incredible team, faculty, and students, we aim to provide a platform for learning, collaboration, and hands-on experience in coding, development, and more. From workshops to real-world projects, our journey starts now! 💡🚀 Special thanks to Dr. V V Potdar Sir ( Principal Sir ), Prof. Naresh Patil ( TPO sir ) and Shripad Kulkarni ( HOD Sir cse ) for their guidance and support in making this dream a reality. 🙏  A heartfelt thank you to our Founder + Ex-President Ketan Bhogshetti , and Ex-Vice President Sushmita Babanagare for their dedication and vision that brought this club to life. We are excited to embark on this journey and can’t wait to see what the future holds for the Code Club! Date - 13/5/2023 Stay tuned for exciting events, coding sessions, and amazing opportunities. Let’s build the future together! 🔥

events.name: JavaScript Workshop
events.description: Successful JavaScript Workshop for 3rd Year CSE Students! 🎉 We are thrilled to share that Code Club AGPIT has successfully conducted a comprehensive JavaScript workshop for 3rd-year CSE students! 🚀 From understanding the fundamentals to exploring advanced concepts, our participants gained valuable insights into one of the most essential programming languages in the world today. 💻✨ A huge thanks to our dedicated team Ketan Bhogshetti and Vivek Solapure and all the enthusiastic students who made this workshop a success. Together, we continue to empower the next generation of developers! 💪 Stay tuned for more exciting events and workshops! 🎯

events.name: My College Coding Community
events.description: I'm thrilled to share some incredible experiences and achievements with the coding community at my college. Being a part of this vibrant group has been a journey of growth, collaboration, and innovation. 🌟 Website Development: Leveraging my skills in ReactJS, I developed a dynamic and user-friendly website for our community. This project was a fantastic opportunity to apply my technical knowledge and contribute to our shared goals. (LINK: https://lnkd.in/d9yhptvq )  🗣️ Session Leadership: I had the privilege of conducting several sessions on JavaScript, where I guided fellow students through core concepts and advanced techniques. Sharing knowledge and seeing others progress has been immensely rewarding. 🤝 Mentorship and Group Discussions: Serving as both a mentor and an active participant in our group discussions has honed my communication and team management skills. Engaging with peers, exchanging ideas, and solving problems together has been a cornerstone of my experience.In addition to these highlights, I've had the chance to work with technologies like Firebase, Node.js, ReactJS, Vanilla JS, DOM programming, Mongoose, and MongoDB, enhancing my technical toolkit and problem-solving abilities.@VivekSolapure
